content.eamr: ( ing-8 "1 red onion, cut into wedges" )

content.text: 1 (1 pound) eggplant, sliced into 1/4 inch rounds
content.eamr: ( ing-11 "1 (1 pound) eggplant, sliced into 1/4 inch rounds" )

content.text: 1 red bell pepper, cut into wedges
content.eamr: ( ing-12 "1 red bell pepper, cut into wedges" )

content.text: 1 yellow bell pepper, cut into wedges
content.eamr: ( ing-13 "1 yellow bell pepper, cut into wedges" )

content.text: 0) In a large resealable plastic bag, mix the olive oil, parsley, oregano, basil, vinegar, kosher salt, pepper, and garlic.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "mix"@38:41 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the olive oil"@42:55 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "parsley"@57:64 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "oregano"@66:73 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "basil"@75:80 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "vinegar"@82:89 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "kosher salt"@91:102 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "pepper"@104:110 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "garlic"@116:122 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large resealable plastic bag"@6:36 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Place the onion, asparagus, mushrooms, eggplant, red bell pepper, and yellow bell pepper into the bag.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-8 "the onion"@9:18 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "asparagus"@20:29 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "mushrooms"@31:40 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-11 "eggplant"@42:50 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-12 "red bell pepper"@52:67 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-13 "yellow bell pepper"@73:91 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-1-0 "the bag"@97:104 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Seal, and marinate 2 hours in the refrigerator, turning occasionally Preheat the grill for high heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Seal"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-1 "marinate"@13:21 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-2-0 "2 hours"@22:29 / DUR )
		:loc ( tool-2-0 "the refrigerator"@33:49 / TOOL )
		:simultaneous ( ac-2-2 "turning"@51:58 / AC
			:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		)
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-3 "Preheat"@72:79 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-2-1 "the grill"@80:89 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-2-0 "high heat"@94:103 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Grill the vegetables 6 minutes on each side, until tender.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Grill"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( "the vegetables"@9:23 / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-4-0 "6 minutes"@24:33 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-4-0 "until tender"@48:60 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:mnr ( "on each side"@34:46 / OTHER )
	)
)
